meta.description: Determine the number of processes A and B to run to maximize the total number of coins plated given resource constraints.

sets.name: PROCESSES
sets.description: Types of processes available for plating coins.

params.name: coins_per_process
params.description: Number of coins plated per process.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of times each process is run.

objective.name: max_coins_plated
objective.description: Maximize the total number of coins plated.

constraints.name: gold_constraint
constraints.description: Total gold used by processes cannot exceed available gold.

constraints.name: wire_constraint
constraints.description: Total wires used by processes cannot exceed available wires.
